p: T- and B-cell epitopes have been mapped on DENV structural proteins such as EDIII and NS proteins ( Kurane et al., 1998). The right combination of epitopes expressed in protein subunit vaccines could be the basis for an effective and safe vaccine at moderate cost. Structural and NS DENV proteins have been produced in adequate amounts in many expression systems including Escherichia coli ( Simmons et al., 1998) baculovirus in Spodoptera frugiperda insect cells and Drosophila cells ( Velzing et al., 1999), yeast ( Tan et al., 2007), and vaccinia virus ( Men et al., 2000).
